# CFRunLoopGetMain()

**Function**

Returns the main CFRunLoop object.

## Declaration

```swift
func CFRunLoopGetMain() -> CFRunLoop!
```

## Return Value

The main run loop. Ownership follows the [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFMemoryMgmt/Concepts/Ownership.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001148-SW1].

## Getting a Run Loop

- **CFRunLoopGetCurrent()**: Returns the CFRunLoop object for the current thread.
